item.title: Value Over Price: Winning the Game of Perception in Online Business
item.description: In the cutthroat realm of online business, entrepreneurs often find themselves embroiled in price wars, assuming that the lowest prices will attract customers and increase market share. However, a more potent strategy exists: enhancing the perceived value of their products or services. Indeed, if …
